d:
I'm not interested in working on this gallery so if anyone else is interested, be my guest. Just uploading for posterity. The MTL English Version should be out shortly after this

Lime's Notes:
"This time, I've drawn Mizuki from "One-Punch Man."

It's been a while since I've drawn a One-Punch Man character.
My intention was to draw her from her first appearance in the original manga, but with the start of the third season of the anime, I finally had the necessary drawing materials, such as color samples, to begin... that's how it went.

While the anime itself has received quite a bit of harsh criticism, what I personally couldn't forgive was the nerf to Mizuki's costume, changing it from racing bloomers to leggings.
I was truly disappointed by that, so I made sure the costume was strictly based on the original manga.

I could have used Blackluster as the male character, but I wanted a visual contrast, so I chose a younger boy.
However, Mizuki is incredibly tall (probably close to 2 meters),
so honestly, the interaction with the younger boy was quite difficult due to the size difference, but I managed to gloss over it with some creative liberties and sheer force of will.

I haven't drawn such a muscular character recently, so I enjoyed it. I would appreciate any feedback you might have."
